step_feedback.feedback: While you attempted to tighten your whole body during inhalation, the inconsistent MAE values across different body parts suggest that the muscle engagement wasn't fully synchronized. Focus on engaging all muscle groups simultaneously.

Remember to place your hands on your abdomen to monitor your breathing. The MAE values indicate inconsistent abdominal muscle engagement during breathing. Try to maintain a steady, controlled breathing pattern.
The visualization technique is important.  Inconsistent MAE values suggest you may not be fully visualizing the fluid movement to your chest during inhalation. Concentrate on this visualization.
The relaxation during exhalation seems inconsistent.  The MAE values show inconsistent muscle relaxation. Focus on completely relaxing your muscles as you exhale, visualizing the fluid moving out.

exercise_summary: You attempted the deep breathing exercise, but consistency in muscle engagement and visualization needs improvement. Focus on tightening all muscles simultaneously during inhalation and completely relaxing them during exhalation.  Visualize fluid movement throughout the process.
